author: fchrist
msg: STANBOL-236 Use the new property jar.executor.workingdirectory to configure in which directory Stanbol is launched for integrations-tests.

With this commit the launch directory changes from ${basedir} to ${project.build.directory}/launchdir. Additionally, a 'mvn clean' now only cleans the 'target' directory as the launch dir is now a subdirectory of 'target'.
Tests can resolve the configured launch dir by using System.getProperty("jar.executor.workingdirectory").

author: fchrist
msg: STANBOL-236 Added new configuration property jar.executor.workingdirectory.
If this property is present and it represents an accessible directory the JAR executor will execute in this working directory. If the directory does not exist, the JAR executor will try to create it.
